item.title: Track by TrueFalse
item.description:
Track Track is a cloud-based scraping tool that allows you to scrape data from any website and send it to your Discord server. Click on the logo to go to the project’s website.
How does it work? Track uses Discord Webhooks to send the data to Prometech’s servers, which then sends it to your Discord server. How do I use it? You can send a project request on Prometech website.
